Title: ColorBox (WPF Gradient Color Picker)
Description: This tool/control lets you create solid, linear gradient and radial gradient brushes.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

This tool/control lets you create solid, linear gradient and radial gradient brushes.
This control can be used within any WPF application targeting .Net Framework 4.0 or higher.

Behavior



Properties/Events

Property Description
Color Gets/Sets the currently selected color.
Brush Gets/Sets the currently selected brush.


Event Description
ColorChanged Occurs when the Color value changes.
